ygData.subject: Re: Barbarians Good/Evil?
ygData.msgSnippet: Warrens is a great place to hunt if you want to keep good faction in borth Erudin and Paineel-- usually a factions raise in one, lowers another. Any one hunt
ygData.messageBody:
Warrens is a great place to hunt if you want to
keep good faction in borth Erudin and Paineel--
usually a factions raise in one, lowers another. Any one
hunt in Kerra Island?? I know the Erudites probably
love to kill the fuzzballs, but I'm not sure if I
should. BTW -- if you kill that SK near the dock you get
great faction with the Mages of Erudin (espec. when you
turn in his bones), but if you do it more than once,
you'll need to pro'lly kill LOTS of kobolds in Warrens
before you show your face again in Paineel. <br><br>As
for Your Troll name -- have you simply tried "Stan"??
I would love to see that -- and then the surname
"Lee" to follow, or maybe "Daman." I have a group of 3
friends and we're all going to start either trolls or
ogres -- can't wait to run over the hills toward the
orc lift in Kelethin shouting "ME BASH DEM ELFSIS!!!"
and see the newbies run and scream!!!!!!<br><br>Xela
(5 kills from being named Orcbane)<br>19th seasoned
druid<br>Xev
